function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Exchange of medical information over blockchain protocol may lead to privacy and security risks.","Impact":"Unauthorized access to sensitive medical information, potential data breaches, and privacy violations.","Mitigation":"Implementation of robust encryption algorithms, access control mechanisms, and regular security audits and assessments.","Technologies":"Asymmetric cryptography, robust encryption schemes, access control mechanisms, blockchain auditing tools.","People":"Patients, healthcare providers, system administrators.","Owner":"System administrators, blockchain developers, cybersecurity experts."},{"Description":"Pseudonymous identity information may pose risks to patient privacy and confidentiality.","Impact":"Potential exposure of patient identities and the possibility of de-anonymization, leading to privacy breaches and discrimination.","Mitigation":"Implementation of additional privacy-preserving techniques such as zero-knowledge proofs, continuous monitoring of identity systems, and strict data access controls.","Technologies":"Zero-knowledge proofs, continuous monitoring tools, data access control mechanisms.","People":"Patients, healthcare providers, system administrators.","Owner":"System administrators, blockchain developers, privacy experts."},{"Description":"Dependence on open-source implementation for PGP encryption may introduce vulnerabilities and security risks.","Impact":"Potential exploitation of security vulnerabilities, exposure of medical data to unauthorized parties, and compromise of patient confidentiality.","Mitigation":"Regular security updates and patches, independent security reviews of the encryption implementation, and adoption of additional encryption layers for enhanced security.","Technologies":"Security patching tools, independent security reviews, additional encryption layers.","People":"Patients, healthcare providers, system administrators, encryption experts.","Owner":"System administrators, blockchain developers, encryption experts."}]}
